metadata.Title: CVE-2013-0202 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ownCloud 4.5.5, 4.0.10, and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the action parameter to core/ajax/sharing.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0202` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> owncloud packages in Ubuntu are now empty seth-arnold> I don't know where the repository is, but the checkin is 306d5ee

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.4debian-0ubuntu1').
